data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Wycombe with the kick-off.
Miguel Angel Guerrero (Nottingham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 29, Lyle Taylor scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
The first-half has come to a close in Nottingham.
The second half is underway in Nottingham - Nottingham with the kick-off.
In the minute 46, Ryan Yates is on a sub for Samba Sow for Nottingham.
Adebayo Akinfenwa is replacing David Wheeler for the away team.
Wycombe make their second substitution with Garath McCleary replacing Scott Kashket.
In the minute 67, Wycombe's Curtis Thompson has been booked in Nottingham.
The home team replace Sammy Ameobi with Joe Lolley.
Goal! Lyle Taylor extends Nottingham's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 76, Nottingham make their third substitution with Harry Arter replacing Miguel Angel Guerrero.
The away team replace Anis Mehmeti with Alex Samuel.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
